metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16051 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before 11.0.6, 11.1.x before 11.1.5, and 11.2.x before 11.2.2. There is Orphaned Upload Files Exposure.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
